title: Tin - leading companies worldwide based on production output 2017
yAxis: Production output in thousand metric tons
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Production output in thousand metric tons for 10 number of Largest Tin Producerss.
The maximum Production output in thousand metric tons 74.5 is found at Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) and the minimum is found at Gejiu Zi-Li (China) where Largest Tin Producers is 8.7.
The difference of Production output in thousand metric tons between the highest and lowest Largest Tin Producers is 65.8.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Largest Tin Producers in the x axis and Production output in thousand metric tons in the y axis.
The maximum Production output in thousand metric tons 74.5 is found at Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) and the minimum is found at Gejiu Zi-Li (China) where Largest Tin Producers is 8.7.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Production output in thousand metric tons for 10 number of Largest Tin Producerss.
The maximum Production output in thousand metric tons 74.5 is found at Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) and the minimum is found at Gejiu Zi-Li (China) where Largest Tin Producers is 8.7.
The difference of Production output in thousand metric tons between the highest and lowest Largest Tin Producers is 65.8.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Production output in thousand metric tons for 10 number of Largest Tin Producerss.
The maximum Production output in thousand metric tons 74.5 is found at Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) and the minimum is found at Gejiu Zi-Li (China) where Largest Tin Producers is 8.7.
The second highest Production output in thousand metric tons is appeared to be the Largest Tin Producers PT Timah (Indonesia).
The difference of Production output in thousand metric tons between the highest and lowest Largest Tin Producers is 65.8.

The Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) has the highest Production output in thousand metric tons, followed by PT Timah (Indonesia), and Malaysia Smelting Corporation (Malaysia). Down to the Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China) which is the lowest.
The lowest value 8.7 at Gejiu Zi-Li (China) is almost 3.24 times smaller than the average value 22.98.
